review: This game is fantastic, I've never played similar shooters like metal slug before but I still had a fantastic time with this game. Its still in development and so far I am impressed. I have also had no tachnical difficulties as of yet while playing on a terrible PC.
Epic game, really fun. Finally a great dinosaur game.
Pretty much GTA in Hong Kong, complete with 2 white people and 1 Black guy, everyone else is Chinese?
